title: THE OPTIMISTIC FISHERMAN
content: Tom Thompson, Canadian Painter This is based on a black and white photo of Thomson about 100 years ago, probably not long before he drowned at the age of 40.  Acrylic on Wood Panel - 10" x 8" - ©Bruce Docker, 2015 $150.00  Free Shipping in U.S.   International shipping is only slightly more, but please,  Email me for details at brucedocker at yahoo dot com.  It's probably not more than about $20.00 to ship to Canada or Europe.
